title: Author Scientific Summaries Using Ready4showSynopsis
text: Open science workflows ideally span unbroken chain data-ingest production scientific summary manuscript. extensive workflows provide explicit means linking content scientific summary analysis reports.

title: Author Scientific Summaries Using Ready4showSynopsis
text: ready4show includes number classes methods help integrate manuscript authoring reproducible workflow.

what: Create a synopsis of the manuscript to be authored
title: Author Scientific Summaries Using Ready4showSynopsis
text: start create X, instance Ready4showSynopsis, ready4framework module (S4) class. can use X record metadata manuscript authored (including details study summarised title format intended output).
code: X <- Ready4showSynopsis(background_1L_chr = "Our study is entirely fictional.",                         coi_1L_chr = "None declared.",                         conclusion_1L_chr = "These fake results are not interesting.",                         digits_int = 3L,                         ethics_1L_chr = "The study was reviewed and granted approval by Awesome University's Human Research Ethics Committee (1111111.1).",                         funding_1L_chr = "The study was funded by Generous Benefactor.",                         interval_chr = "three months",                         keywords_chr = c("entirely","fake","do", "not","cite"),                         outp_formats_chr = "PDF",                         sample_desc_1L_chr = "The study sample is fake data that pretends to be young people aged 12 to 25 years who attended Australian primary care services for mental health related needs between November 2019 to August 2020.",                         title_1L_chr = "A hypothetical study using fake data")

title: Author Scientific Summaries Using Ready4showSynopsis
text: Authorship details can added slots X contain ready4show_authors ready4show_instututes ready4 framework sub-modules. can see call exhibitSlot, X created authorship information. can add details author repeated calls renewSlot method. updated authorship table can now inspected. now need add additional information author institute. updated institutes table can now inspected.
code: exhibitSlot(X,             "authors_r3") X <- renewSlot(X,           "authors_r3",           first_nm_chr = "Alejandra",           middle_nm_chr = "Rocio",           last_nm_chr = "Scienceace",           title_chr = "Dr",           qualifications_chr = "MD, PhD",           institute_chr = "Institute_A, Institute_B",           sequence_int = 1,           is_corresponding_lgl = T,           email_chr = "fake_email@fake_institute.com") %>%   renewSlot("authors_r3",             first_nm_chr = "Fionn",             middle_nm_chr = "Seamus",             last_nm_chr = "Researchchamp",             title_chr = "Prof",             qualifications_chr = "MSc, PhD",             institute_chr = "Institute_C, Institute_B",             sequence_int = 2,             email_chr = "fake_email@unreal_institute.com") X %>%   exhibitSlot("authors_r3") X <- renewSlot(X,           "institutes_r3",           short_name_chr = "Institute_A",            long_name_chr = "Awesome University, Shanghai") %>%   renewSlot("institutes_r3",             short_name_chr = "Institute_B",              long_name_chr = "August Institution, London") %>%   renewSlot("institutes_r3",             new_val_xx = "use_renew_mthd",             short_name_chr = "Institute_C",              long_name_chr = "Highly Ranked Uni, Montreal") X %>%   exhibitSlot("institutes_r3")

title: Author Scientific Summaries Using Ready4showSynopsis
text: Finally can add look-table changes wish make analysis code names variables / parameters presented manuscript text. edits can now inspected call exhibitSlot.
code: X <- renewSlot(X,                "correspondences_r3",                old_nms_chr = c("PHQ9", "GAD7"),                new_nms_chr = c("PHQ-9", "GAD-7")) X %>%   exhibitSlot("correspondences_r3") # Add Exhibit Method

title: Authors and Citation
text: Matthew Hamilton. Author, maintainer. Glen Wiesner. Author. Orygen. Copyright holder, funder. VicHealth. Funder. Victoria University. Funder.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Matthew Hamilton Glen Wiesner  (2022). ready4show: Author Literate Programs Share Insights Applying Ready4 Framework. Version 0.0.0.9071. https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5644568
code: @Manual{,   doi = {10.5281/zenodo.5644568},   title = {ready4show: Author Literate Programs to Share Insights from Applying the Ready4 Framework},   author = {Matthew Hamilton and Glen Wiesner},   year = {2022},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9071},   url = {https://ready4-dev.github.io/ready4show/}, }

what: Author Literate Programs to Share Insights from Applying the Ready4 Framework
title:
Author Literate Programs to Share Insights from Applying the Ready4
    Framework
text: ready4show provides tools authoring technical documentation, analysis reports scientific summaries showcase insights generated open, modular mental health system models. development version ready4show package made available part process testing documenting package. questions, please contact authors (matthew.hamilton@orygen.org.au). install development version software, run following commands R console:
code: utils::install.packages("devtools")  devtools::install_github("ready4-dev/ready4show")

code: exhibit.ready4show_authors(   x,   caption_1L_chr = NULL,   mkdn_tbl_ref_1L_chr = NULL,   output_type_1L_chr = "HTML",   use_lbls_as_col_nms_1L_lgl = T )  # S4 method for ready4show_authors exhibit(   x,   caption_1L_chr = NULL,   mkdn_tbl_ref_1L_chr = NULL,   output_type_1L_chr = "HTML",   use_lbls_as_col_nms_1L_lgl = T )  exhibit.ready4show_correspondences(   x,   caption_1L_chr = NULL,   mkdn_tbl_ref_1L_chr = NULL,   output_type_1L_chr = "HTML",   use_lbls_as_col_nms_1L_lgl = T )  # S4 method for ready4show_correspondences exhibit(   x,   caption_1L_chr = NULL,   mkdn_tbl_ref_1L_chr = NULL,   output_type_1L_chr = "HTML",   use_lbls_as_col_nms_1L_lgl = T )  exhibit.ready4show_institutes(   x,   caption_1L_chr = NULL,   mkdn_tbl_ref_1L_chr = NULL,   output_type_1L_chr = "HTML",   use_lbls_as_col_nms_1L_lgl = T )  # S4 method for ready4show_institutes exhibit(   x,   caption_1L_chr = NULL,   mkdn_tbl_ref_1L_chr = NULL,   output_type_1L_chr = "HTML",   use_lbls_as_col_nms_1L_lgl = T )

title: ready4show: Author Literate Programs to Share Insights from Applying the Ready4 Framework — ready4show-package
